src:
Serba-serbi Bisnis Detektif Swasta di Indonesia
04 Nov 2019, 01:16 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Tim Infografis Zaki Alfaraby

Jakarta - Detektif swasta, sebuah profesi yang benar ada di kehidupan nyata. Cara kerja mereka juga mirip dengan cerita detektif di film yakni melakukan penyelidikan dengan berbagai cara hingga teka-teki terpecahkan.Untuk menemukan para penyedia jasa detektif swasta cukup sebenarnya cukup mudah. Sebab mereka kini juga mulai menawarkan jasanya di media sosial seperti Facebook dan Instagram.Percaya atau tidak, profesi detektif swasta memang benar ada dalam kehidupan nyata. Mereka menawarkan jasanya untuk berbagai macam misi, seperti menyelidiki pasangan selingkuh, pegawai yang korupsi, penyembunyian aset, hingga memata-matai rekanan bisnis.Biasanya mereka yang menjalani profesi ini bergerak secara diam-diam. Mereka menyembunyikan identitas asli dirinya.Bagaimana cara kerja mereka? Berapa tarifnya? Berikut berita selengkapnya:Lanjut ke halaman berikutnya >>> (das/ang)
text:
Various Detective Private Business in Indonesia
Nov 04 2019, 01:16 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Zaki Alfaraby's infographic team

Jakarta - Private investigator, a profession that really exists in real life. The way they work is also similar to the detective story in the film, which is to investigate in various ways until the puzzle is solved. To find private detective service providers is actually quite easy. Because they are now also starting to offer their services on social media like Facebook and Instagram. Believe it or not, the private detective profession really does exist in real life. They offer their services for various missions, such as investigating cheating spouses, corrupt employees, hiding assets, to spying on business partners. Usually those who undergo this profession move quietly. They hide their real identity. How do they work? What is the charge? Here is the complete news: Continue to the next page >>> (das / ang)
